LanguageData.BOD_Bullet.label: Doom Bolt
LanguageData.Bullet_OSOK.label: railgun projectile
LanguageData.holyhellfirebow.label: Holy Hellfire Bow
LanguageData.holyhellfirebow.description: There was a wizard, cleric, and a ranger that met one fair day. Together they designed a weapon that utilized all their expertises. This weapon is the result, a bow with the capability of launching highly volitile fireballs.
LanguageData.holyhellfirebow.tools.limb.label: limb
LanguageData.holyhellfirebow.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Holy Hellfire Bow
LanguageData.omnibullet.label: Omni Bullet
LanguageData.omnigun.label: Omni Gun
LanguageData.omnigun.description: Someone once wondered what would happen if you could shoot shogun shells at the range of a sniper rifle with a rate of fire of a minigun. Well wonder no more and make this weapon.
LanguageData.omnigun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.omnigun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.omnigun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Omni Gun
LanguageData.OSOK.label: Mutilator
LanguageData.OSOK.description: Many wondered if there could be a precision sniper rifle with the capability taking down enemies in a single shot. This weapon was the result. They were impressed by how much destruction a single round could do, so they made it a double barelled precision rifle. The bullets are without equal, tearing apart anything they hit. "You name it, you maim it."
LanguageData.OSOK.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.OSOK.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OSOK.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mutilator
